title: How COVID-19 is Impacting Companies’ M&A Strategies
description: Tim Ingrassia, co-chairman of Global Mergers & Acquisitions for Goldman Sachs Investment Banking, provides an update on the recent M&A slowdown. “I fully expect M&A to normalize and recover because all those deals that aren’t happening right now, some significant percentage of them are deals that will happen,” Ingrassia says. “And so then it’s a question of when will they happen?”
